content.title: Mapping Services to UI Elements
content.body:
• From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, select LastName{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label-lblLastName and select text{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, select Phone{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label-lblPhoneNumber and select text{string}.
